Keywords: Asgardian , Deity , Future , Mystical , Past
Real Name: Loki Laufeyson
Special Powers
(+5 POINTS) THE TESSERACT: Kid Loki starts the game with the Disney+ #s006 Tesseract equipped.
WE'RE DONE TALKING, LET'S GO, JUST DO WHAT YOU WANT, I GUESS: Leadership, Shape Change. // UNIQUE MODIFIER - FREE: Choose a combat value other than damage. Until your next turn Kid Loki has "Opposing characters within range and line of fire modify the chosen value -1."

Comments
June 30, 2022
TrexBeast87
Placement is key to get the most out of him, the best thing to do is completely forget about the Tesseract and equip him with Emotional Modifier. Stealth will help with his survivability, but the bread and butter is getting him to give out -2 defense or -2 attack with the Modifier equipped making him one of, if not the most playable Loki from the set.
May 31, 2022
Bobcat2022
If you swapped his first-and-last clicks with his middle clicks, giving him 11 Attack and Super Senses to start (and after a 3-damage hit), he'd be a lot better. But if we're wishing, why not give him Hypersonic Speed, Cosmic Energy TA, and a 21 printed defense, right? Anyhow, he's a real finesse piece in any setting. In Sealed, especially if you didn't pull any Perplex, he could be key. But his special power requires too much patience, and analysis of exactly where your opponent can and will move their pieces, to get work done in my hands.
May 28, 2022
BubbleBuster101
If using stealth, an opponent would have to come in for a hit. If you use his Free -1 for attack, anyone that would come hit him would be weaker. Then with the tesseract, he could have PC to help. If used with some other prob/perplex properly, he could be an annoying little figure. I like him anyway…
May 3, 2022
Goop
He seems good at first till you realize he needs range and LOF. Which would put your opponents in an easy charge range to just move in and kill him. He's very reliant on that shape change to stay alive. Still for 30 pts if left ignored in right spot he can pull his value. You really need to put tesseract on him to get that value though.
